EmailTemplate.description: cloned from the August 2018 webinar invite, topic is AppTx
EmailTemplate.name: Global_Email_GET Partner Newsletter_2018.October 2018 GET Webinar Invite
EmailTemplate.subject: Pivotal Global Ecosystem October Webinar: Application Transformation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=edit me}},
At the Partner Summit preceding SpringOne, VP of Platform Architecture Raghvender Arni suggested the best way to grow your AppTx practice was to spend time with Matt Russell. Well, now is your chance! Come hear the man himself, Matt Russell, talk about how large organizations plan and execute their application transformation, and how partners make it possible.
We'll be covering:
- Pivotal's approach to Application Replatforming - from operational to strategic
- How customers are driving growth and staying competitive through legacy application transformation - How partners are critical to Pivotal's go to market strategy to help transform how the world builds software
Looking forward to seeing you there!
Date: Wednesday, October 17, 2018 Time: 10PM PST
Thanks, The Pivotal Global Ecosystem Team Register here <[[https://partners.pivotal.io/English/webinars-events.aspx]]>
